评论概述: Comfort and style all in one top!!
评论详情: Arrived in a zippered plastic  bag without a foul odor or serious wrinkles.  Colors and pattern matches online picture and sizing was accurate.  Fabric/material is on the thinner side but it's soft and doesn't wrinkle easily.  The top has a loose fit that doesn cling but isn't baggy or sloppy looking.  The top doesn't hold in your body heat.  I washed in the washer on a regular cycle in cold water and dryed on medium heat in the dryer until almost dry then hung it to finish drying. No shrinking or wrinkling occured. I get compliments each time I wear it whether I dress it up or wear it with jeans and a cardigan. This top is so versatile it should be a staple in your wardrobe too!! I plan to buy more colors.
